Event Manager Buzz the Cat:
Welcome! I am Buzz, the faithful cat of Magus Ahulon Raulian! My master, one of the wisest of the Ivory Tower, is cautious with his affections. Recently he has quarreled with his lady love and she is quite upset. She was so impressed the last time he collected one million hearts for her, he has vowed to do it all over again! I, along with my master's other cats, have been holding the *Throb, Throb, Rock-Paper-Scissors Event* in all of the villages!
